title: San Francisco/Fisherman's Wharf
name: Sea Lion Cafe
directions: part of Neptune's Palace at the end of Pier 39
content: Good restaurant if you're with kids; it serves fish & chips, fresh seafood entr√©es, cafe sandwiches, salads, and pasta dishes while watching the sea lions (but expect to pay a "San Francisco Minimum Wage Surcharge" with every meal).
